short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tab Count Visualizer helps you see how many tabs you have open currently, and encourages you to reduce that number.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
I built this because I have a problem with my tab count growing over time.

When you open a new tab, you will be presented with a page that contains:

* The number of tabs you have open
* The number of windows you have open
* Links to random tabs as a suggestion to try to close them
* Links to duplicate tabs
* A graph of your maximum tab counts per day


Maybe we can drive our tab count to a reasonable level.
